title: Christmas mincemeat tart
ingredients: ['110g plain flour', 'Pinch salt', '50g butter, softened', '50g caster sugar', '2 egg yolks', '6 level tablespoons mincemeat', '110g ground almonds', '110g caster sugar', '2 egg whites', '1 or 2 drops almond essence', '50g flaked almonds', '4 tablespoons jam, to glaze']
